sense.def:
To hate someone or something
pomeni čutiti izjemen odpor do nekoga ali nečesa.

seg.quote: She was aware of what she was doing and she hated herself for it.
I used to hate going to lectures.
I would hate to move to another house.

sense.def:
Hate
je izjemno močno čustvo odpora do nekoga ali nečesa.

seg.quote: He was a violent bully, destructive and full of hate.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
I hate to say it
napovemo nekaj, kar moramo reči z obžalovanjem, ker je neprijetno.

seg.quote: There is unfortunately—I hate to say it—a substantial amount of racism in our cities.
